# FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

```{r text_faq, echo=FALSE,message = FALSE,warning=FALSE}
# \\textbf{\\color{green}----}
p0<- c("\\textbf{\\color{green}What is the best way to get a hold of the instructor or TA?}")
t0<-c("We prefer you send email via Canvas.")

p1<- c("\\textbf{\\color{green}Can you give me \\textit{one} good reason why I should go to Office Hours?}")
t1<-c("I can give you ten. \\textbf{(1)} To introduce yourself. \\textbf{(2)} To get clarification on assignments. \\textbf{(3)} To discuss topics that came up in class. \\textbf{(4) \\textit{There is free tea, coffee, or espresso in our lab kitchen}}. \\textbf{(5)} You can check to make sure you understood the key points from a class session. \\textbf{(6)} We can give you feedback on ideas for course projects.\\textbf{(7)}  Get advice on successfully navigating college. \\textbf{(8)} Ask questions about how to gain experience for your post-graduation goals. \\textbf{(9)} To get help arranging a study group.\\textbf{(10) \\textit{You don't need a good reason...just come on by.}}")

p2<- c("\\textbf{\\color{green}How will we get class announcements?}")
t2<-c("Via Canvas. Check the course Canvas page for announcements and be sure you are recieving Canvas emails.")

p3<- c("\\textbf{\\color{green}What should we do before class?}")
t3<-c("Complete the assigned reading, watch any assigned videos, or review any websites listed in the assigned material. This material will set the stage for the in-class activities.")

p4<- c("\\textbf{\\color{green}What will we do during class?}")
t4<-c("Learning in our class will be achieved in part via work carried out with groups of fellow students. This will require structured and unstructured discussions and dialogues within and between groups, where we will explore some challenging, important problems and increase our understanding of different perspectives and approaches for addressing them. Consistent informed, thoughtful, and considerate class participation is encouraged (and in some cases required)")

p5<-c("\\textbf{\\color{green}Class discussions are really difficult for me (e.g., shyness, language barriers, a medical condition, other personal reasons). Will this affect my grade?}")
t5<-c("No! Let me know as soon as possible and we will discuss alternative modes of participation.")

p6<- c('\\textbf{\\color{green}When is the "in-class" work due?}')
t6<-c("One week from the date it was assigned.")

p7<- c("\\textbf{\\color{green}What if I miss a class?}")
t7<-c("Attendance is not required, but in many of the sessions we will be completing activities in class that count towards your grade. Most of these can be completed independently, but by doing them in class you will benefit from working collaboratively with the other students. Some of the in-class activities, however, can not be completed on your own. If you miss class on one one of these days, you can elect to make up the lost points with extra-credit assignments.")

p8<-c("\\textbf{\\color{green}There is a day I will have to miss class for a really good reason. What should I do?}")
t8<-c("If you need to miss class for any reason, please let me know as soon as possible so we can make arrangements for you to complete assignments and go over any material you will be missing. I would much rather you focus on your health, attend your conference or competition, or support friends and family in need than struggle to turn in assignments.")
```

```{r comm, echo=FALSE,message = FALSE,warning=FALSE,fig.pos='H'}
# Alignment of graphics with text workaround is here:
# https://stackoverflow.com/questions/64919240/align-text-and-images-in-a-table-pdf-output
# https://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/397708/package-xkeyval-error-valign-undefined-in-families-gin
tbl_img <- data.frame(
logo = c("\\includegraphics[valign=T,scale=.5,raise=7mm]{./course_schedule/icons/envelope-circle-check.png}"),
policy = p0,
text=t0
)
tbl_img %>%
kbl(booktabs = T,
    bottomrule = F,
    # toprule = F,
    # midrule = F,
    escape= F,
    format="latex",
    align="cll",
    col.names = NULL) %>%
kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
kable_styling(latex_options = "HOLD_position") %>% 
# column_spec(2,bold=T,
#           width = "7em", 
#           latex_valign = "m",
#           color = "green",
#           background="white"
#           ) %>%
column_spec(1,width = "5em", background="green", latex_valign = "m") %>% 
column_spec(2, width = "17em",latex_valign = "m", color = "black", background="white") %>% 
  column_spec(3, width = "30em",latex_valign = "m", color = "black", background="white") %>%
sub("\\\\toprule", "", .) %>% # Removes top line
sub("\\\\bottomrule", "", .) # remove bottom line 
# %>%
#   column_spec(1,latex_valign = "m")

```
\begin{spacing}{0.0}
\end{spacing}
